cause.description:
Sharks play a huge roll in keeping our ocean ecosystem balanced, however, because of unmonitored culling of sharks many sharks species are threatened with endangerment. It is estimated that about 100 million sharks are killed every year for their fins for shark fin soup and other traditional cures.
1. To put an end to shark finning
cause.mission: To help preserve the sharks and other marine life
cause.name: Save the Sharks
